content: this text summarizes a legal document about a mediation procedure for a dispute over hereditary succession the parties involved are referred to as da de lu and ce de lu according to the mediation agreement mrs da de lu will receive the entire property including a villa and garages while also gaining ownership of a garage in san giuliano milanese ms ce de lu will receive sums from current accounts and securities held in a bank both parties agree to abandon previous legal proceedings and share the costs equally the notarial expenses for formalizing the hereditary succession will also be divided equally the transfer of property will be formalized in a public deed mrs da de lu agrees to bring a professional liability action against mr va gu the parties declare that their claim to the estate of gr de lu pa ru is satisfied the attorneys confirm that the agreement complies with public policy and is enforceable the parties attorneys sign the agreement waiving joint and several liability
